params.unstakeDelaySec: The new lock duration before the deposit can be withdrawn.

returns._0: - The deposit (for gas payment) of the account.

returns.info: - Full deposit information of given account.

params.withdrawAddress: - The address to send withdrawn value.
- The address to send withdrawn value.

addStake(uint32).notice: Add to the account's stake - amount and delay any pending unstake is first cancelled.

depositTo(address).notice: Add to the deposit of the given account.

deposits(address).notice: maps paymaster to their deposits and stakes

unlockStake().notice: Attempt to unlock the stake. The value can be withdrawn (using withdrawStake) after the unstake delay.

withdrawStake(address).notice: Withdraw from the (unlocked) stake. Must first call unlockStake and wait for the unstakeDelay to pass.

documentation.text: maps paymaster to their deposits and stakes

Internal method to return just the stake info.
 @param addr - The account to query.

Add to the deposit of the given account.
 @param account - The account to add to.

Attempt to unlock the stake.
 The value can be withdrawn (using withdrawStake) after the unstake delay.

Manage deposits and stakes.
 Deposit is just a balance used to pay for UserOperations (either by a paymaster or an account).
 Stake is value locked for at least "unstakeDelay" by a paymaster.
